title: Asker Venstres kommunevalgprogram
description: Printed program for Asker Venstre's political campaign during the 2019 local elections.

title: Kristensamfunnet
description: We have redesigned the website for Kristensamfunnet i Norge (The Christian Community in Norway) twice, using Joomla the first time and WordPress on the new website launched recently. The project includes independent websites for each congregation.

title: HotWok
description: Restaurant in Bergen. The simple website gives the visitor a quick overview of the type of restaurant, and includes a full menu with all available dishes available for eat-in and take-away.

title: Elias mat & sånt
description: Elias mat & sånt serve good lunch, tasty dinners and delicious desserts at the right price. Their menu is inspired by Norwegian nature, and that theme is conveied through the site layout as well.

title: Verksøya 2019
description: Verksøya 2019 was a summer festival in Norway. We designed the logo, a website for ticket sales and a complete set of material for publicity, including flyers, posters, social media banners and newspaper ads.

title: Nordic IT Project
description: A simple and elegant single-page website, presenting the company and their services, including a small section where the owners can add short updates.

title: Askeladden Steinerbarnehage
description: The Kindergarten in Hurum wanted a new website for parents and anyone interested in learning more about this unique approach to childcare. The website includes a private section for parents where images can be uploaded with less privacy concerns.

title: Askerbøringen
description: A newspaper designed for the local elections in Norway and printed in aproximately 60.000 copies.

title: Berg og Blåne Logo
description: We designed a new logo for Berg og Blåne. They work with Sewing of national costumes (Bunads) from all over Norway. An elegant business card was also created. In addition, we delivered a matching website and a stamp with their business information.

title: ModaZ - Zumba Wear
description: A complete e-commerce solution based on Joomla, and a custom programmed store built from scratch to meet the client's requirements.

title: Westand AS
description: A simple business website created for an accounting firm in Norway. The site includes a list of their services, a contact form and basic information about the company.
